metadata.title: CVE-2018-19219 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In LibSass 3.5-stable, there is an illegal address access at Sass::Eval::operator that will lead to a DoS attack.

notes.note: pfsmorigo> as of 2019-10-04, It's still an open issue

criterions.comment: libsass package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
